Text:
Ol' Brooke is a hottie.  Thanks for the upload.  Looking for this girl, Ashleigh, if you run across her, pics and vids.

http://www.amkingdom.com/tour/model/ash042

@Holy Divr - the previews ALWAYS work...as long as you READ what is posted in the description. 

Thanks bestec, great as always!

Hey guys, thanks for defending me. 

I prefer to handle it the same way I handle other people who can't or wont' follow directions (or refuse to read them) ... I just ignore them. :D

Of course, it's possible that sometimes my preview links won't work, so every time someone claims that they don't, I check it out, and if they do work, I just expunge the complaint from my memory. 

Col. Tigh, please post your requests on Suprbay.  Just easier for me to find them, respond, etc.
